title: the new skin profille for kayn
body: when you play as soulhunter kayn and turn to shadow assassin or rhaast your profille dosnt change as the other champs with skins

replies.body: Ah you mean the champ icon down in the bottom? I hadn't noticed that yet myself, but I'll be sure to pass that info along for ya!
it needs extra work to do , will be done someday, but no date until yet
